entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is the one who is getting presents and has a tantrum. He is described as going red in the face and wanting his money's worth.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who can see Dudley's tantrum coming on and is eating his bacon quickly to avoid it.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is trying to calm down Dudley by offering him more presents and is described as sensing danger.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is chuckling at Dudley's behavior and making a comment about his father.

entities.name: racing bike
entities.description: A racing bike is one of the gifts that Dudley is unwrapping.

relationships.description: Aunt Petunia offers Dudley more presents to calm him down.
Harry can see a huge tantrum coming on from Dudley.
Uncle Vernon makes a comment about Dudley's father.
Aunt Petunia goes to answer the telephone.
